snippet.title: Half Minute Hero Trailer
snippet.description:
PlayStation Insider ( http://psinsider.com ) Marvelous Entertainment's RTS/Action RPG/Shooter, Half Minute Hero, comes to the PSP this month.

Forums: http://forums.e-mpire.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/PSInsider
